keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will fight overdevelopment to protect our green spaces.
I will support local schools, hospitals and social services.
I will win investment for local jobs, apprenticeships and high streets.
Get the best Brexit deal possible to deliver economic security for our future.

issues.brexitEurope: Get the best Brexit deal possible to deliver economic security for our future.
issues.environment: I will fight overdevelopment to protect our green spaces.

endorsements.endorsement: Back me on Thursday 8th June to lead Britain.

quotes.text: Give me and my candidate your vote on Thursday 8th June and I will: Provide strong and stable leadership for our country; Get the best Brexit deal possible to deliver economic security for our future; Always stand up for you and your family; Don't risk our future at this crucial moment in history with a vote for anyone else.

images.caption: Images of Matt Smith with Theresa May and local supporters, and solo, engaging in campaign activities.
